name: Rally Masters: Race of Champions
summary: Rally Masters throws you into the Michelin Race of Champions by setting new standards in driving physics, graphical presentation and depth of game play. Choose from over 17 real licensed rally cars including: Mitsubishi Lancer, Skoda Octavia WRC, Peugeot 306F2 Evo, Citroen Xsara Kit Car, Renault Megane Kit Car, Lancia HF Delta Intergale, Lancia Stratos and race them on more than 40 tracks based on real world locations.
